arv14:3: Iha bhikṣavo bhikṣur-utpannānāṁ pāpakānām-akuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ | prahāṇāya chandaṁ janayati | vyāyacchate, vīryam-ārabhate, cittaṁ pragṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti ||
arv14:4: Anutpannānāṁ ca pāpakānām-akuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ | anutpādāya chandaṁ janayati | vyāyacchate, vīryam-ārabhate, cittaṁ pragṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti ||
arv14:5: Anutpannānāṁ kuśalānāṁ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṁ janayati | vyāyacchate, vīryam-ārabhate, cittaṁ pragṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti ||
arv14:6: Utpannānāṁ ca kuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ sthitaye asaṁmoṣāya aprahāṇāya bhūyobhāvāya | vaipulyatāyai paripūryai chandaṁ janayati | vyāyacchate, vīryam-ārabhate, cittaṁ pragṛhṇāti, samyak praṇidadhāti ||
